channel.title: Secret Science Sewer Siblings: Critter Power! (One-Shot)
channel.description:
![Secret Science Sewer Siblings small cover|630x500](upload://rvl4bhb3TEcFBdmJCefumXUaqgN.jpeg) You and your siblings are sewer animals mutated into bipedal beings with bodies and minds similar to human adolescents. You've also been trained in ancient martial arts. Go rescue your mentor and learn to share pizza with your siblings!
[Secret Science Sewer Siblings](https://cloven-pine-games.itch.io/secret-science-sewer-siblings) is a simple tabletop RPG in the vein of Lasers & Feelings. I designed it for the [On-Ramp Jam](https://itch.io/jam/onrampjam-igrc).
In the spirit of on-ramping, one slot is reserved for someone who has joined The Gauntlet in the last three months. Message me if you are interested in the slot.
This one-shot session will run three and a half hours. It will be recorded and posted on YouTube (if all players agree).
Aiming for a story of ninja action and mutant mayhem with just a dash of teen feels, rated PG. The X-Card, Open Door Policy, and Lines and Veils will be in use. This event abides by the [Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.htm).

item.description:
@Alexi_Sarge wrote:

Secret Science Sewer Siblings: Critter Power!
Players: @RichRogers @Stentor_Danielson @tonyplusone
The sewer siblings go bananas when they return to their sewer lair and find their mentor’s been nabbed! Can a slacker pigeon, an emo skunk, and a bunny buckling under the weight of leadership foil the evil plans of the Cosmorillas? And what will happen when their presumed dead former leader makes an appearance…as a cyborg monkey’s paw of the space apes?!
